title: ownetman
author: ownetman
content: Hello friends,For years I was only reading the forum, by now the time come and I registered and I am seeking for your help and opinion.I am creating an startup, and we are at the market-fit level of development. We want to create an VPN-like application, in which you can Configure a full Node in one click, and access it by API. All of your BTC wallet traffic will then go to Nodey RPCs of your choose. All or most of the Nodes we will offer will be secured with TOR Network.https://i.postimg.cc/rwN8hzPy/img.pngI would love you to give me some opinions. Maybe information that you would be willing to pay for such a service? Any relevant questions are more than welcomed.As part of market-fit seeking, we are also having a waitlist, as it is crucial regarding the potential fundraising. https://nodey.app/ if you feel this is valuable, join the waitlist.
